environmentDetail_down_ltt.br: Click to decrease environment detail, which affects the number of lights used in the game. This also affects whether you see ambient animals such as squirrels.

environmentDetail_up_ltt.br: Click to increase environment detail, which affects the number of lights used in the game. This also affects whether you see ambient animals such as squirrels.

environmentDetail_thumb_ltt.br: Click to change environment detail, which affects the number of lights used in the game. This also affects whether you see ambient animals such as squirrels.

lightingDetail_down_ltt.br: Click to decrease lighting detail, which affects whether directional lighting is used.

lightingDetail_up_ltt.br: Click to increase lighting detail, which affects whether directional lighting is used.

lightingDetail_thumb_ltt.br: Click to change lighting detail, which affects whether directional lighting is used.

shadowDetail_down_ltt.br: Click to decrease shadow detail, which affects how realistic the shadows look.

shadowDetail_up_ltt.br: Click to increase shadow detail, which affects how realistic the shadows look.

shadowDetail_thumb_ltt.br: Click to change shadow detail, which affects how realistic the shadows look.

specularEffects_down_ltt.br: Click to decrease specular effects detail, which affects how realistic shiny objects look.

specularEffects_up_ltt.br: Click to increase specular effects detail, which affects how realistic shiny objects look.

specularEffects_thumb_ltt.br: Click to change specular effects detail, which affects how realistic shiny objects look.

terrainResolution_down_ltt.br: Click to decrease terrain resolution, which affects the density of the landscape grid.

terrainResolution_up_ltt.br: Click to increase terrain resolution, which affects the density of the landscape grid.

terrainResolution_thumb_ltt.br: Click to change terrain resolution, which affects the density of the landscape grid.

terrainTextureSize_down_ltt.br: Click to decrease terrain texture size, which affects the quality of terrain textures.

terrainTextureSize_up_ltt.br: Click to increase terrain texture size, which affects the quality of terrain textures.

terrainTextureSize_thumb_ltt.br: Click to change terrain texture size, which affects the quality of terrain textures.

waterDetail_down_ltt.br: Click to decrease water detail, which affects how water looks and moves.

waterDetail_up_ltt.br: Click to increase water detail, which affects how water looks and moves.

waterDetail_thumb_ltt.br: Click to change water detail, which affects how water looks and moves.

detailObjects_down_ltt.br: Click to decrease detail objects. Medium adds additional details to buildings, while high also adds more grass detail when in Zoo Guest Mode.

detailObjects_up_ltt.br: Click to increase detail objects. Medium adds additional details to buildings, while high also adds more grass detail when in Zoo Guest Mode.

detailObjects_thumb_ltt.br: Click to change detail objects. Medium adds additional details to buildings, while high also adds more grass detail when in Zoo Guest Mode.

objectDetail_down_ltt.br: Click to decrease object detail, which affects how realistic objects look.

objectDetail_up_ltt.br: Click to increase object detail, which affects how realistic objects look.

objectDetail_thumb_ltt.br: Click to change object detail, which affects how realistic objects look.

objectTextureDetail_down_ltt.br: Click to decrease object texture detail, which affects the quality of object textures.

objectTextureDetail_up_ltt.br: Click to increase object texture detail, which affects the quality of object textures.

objectTextureDetail_thumb_ltt.br: Click to change object texture detail, which affects the quality of object textures.

animationDetail_down_ltt.br: Click to decrease animation detail, which controls how realistically animals move.

animationDetail_up_ltt.br: Click to increase animation detail, which controls how realistically animals move.

animationDetail_thumb_ltt.br: Click to change animation detail, which controls how realistically animals move.

viewDistance_down_ltt.br: Click to decrease view distance, which controls the distance at which you see objects.

viewDistance_up_ltt.br: Click to increase view distance, which controls the distance at which you see objects.

viewDistance_thumb_ltt.br: Click to change view distance, which controls the distance at which you see objects.

maxOverheadZoom_down_ltt.br: Click to decrease overhead camera distance, which controls the maximum height of the camera.

maxOverheadZoom_up_ltt.br: Click to increase overhead camera distance, which controls the maximum height of the camera.

maxOverheadZoom_thumb_ltt.br: Click to change overhead camera distance, which controls the maximum height of the camera.

screenDetail_down_ltt.br: Click to disable anti-aliasing, which removes jagged edges on objects.

screenDetail_up_ltt.br: Click to enable anti-aliasing, which removes jagged edges on objects.

screenDetail_thumb_ltt.br: Click to change anti-aliasing, which removes jagged edges on objects.

uiTextShadows_down_ltt.br: Click to disable the font shadow, which adds a shadow to text.

uiTextShadows_up_ltt.br: Click to enable the font shadow, which adds a shadow to text.

uiTextShadows_thumb_ltt.br: Click to change the font shadow, which adds a shadow to text.

uiTextTextures_down_ltt.br: Click to disable font texture detail, which creates more detailed text.

uiTextTextures_up_ltt.br: Click to enable font texture detail, which creates more detailed text.

uiTextTextures_thumb_ltt.br: Click to change font texture detail, which creates more detailed text.

shaderDetail_down_ltt.br: Click to decrease shader detail quality, which affects overall image quality.

shaderDetail_up_ltt.br: Click to increase shader detail quality, which affects overall image quality.

shaderDetail_thumb_ltt.br: Click to change shader detail, which affects overall image quality.

soundproviders_ltt.b: Click to change your sound provider. Note that you may need to obtain the latest drivers for your sound card.
